department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2023-06-20 at 14:00 EDT.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

**Government of Canada Tender Notice**

#### Contract Title

One (1) Procurement Specialist (Intermediate Level) - TSPS

#### Solicitation Number

WS4005261475

#### Reference Number

WS4005261475-Doc4005773467

#### Amendment Number

1

#### Description

**Solicitation Description**
ัชThe Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites Supply Arrangement Holders to submit their interest in providing procurement services under the "Professional procurement services" category.

**Supply Arrangement Requirement**
The following selected supply arrangement holders will be invited to exercise their supply agreement:
* For procurement services: Category 3.7 - Procurement Specialist, Secret, Ontario, Intermediate

**Tender Closing**

The tender closing for the above solicitation is on **2023-06-20T14:00:00**, with an amendment to the formal closing time.

**Notice Details**

* Notice Type: RFP against Supply Arrangement
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective tendering
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* Regions of Delivery: Ontario (except NCR)
*Trade Agreements: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
 

**Contact Information**

* Contact Name: Denbeigh, Andrew
* Contact Email: andrew.denbeigh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Related Documents**

You can find the details for this tender notice on Ariba Discovery at the following link: 
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16393581?extsite=MTYzOTM1ODFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please note that this is not an exhaustive list of requirements, all terms and conditions and conditions of the tender notice are stated on the above link. 

Please review and be aware of all terms and conditions.
